sentences.english: If the aperture is circular , a circular spot of light appears on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 如果孔是圆形的，那么在屏幕上出现一圆形光斑。

sentences.english: These faculae frequently are the forerunners of sunspot formation .
sentences.chinese: 这些光斑常常是形成太阳黑子的先兆。

sentences.english: Simple estimate is to pass the light spot diameter is 2 times or more.
sentences.chinese: 简单的估计，是让通光直径是光斑的2倍或以上。

sentences.english: A luminous spot on a lunar halo.
sentences.chinese: 幻月，假月月晕上的光斑。

sentences.english: Equation (7) is the model dealing with error signals of symmetric faculae.
sentences.chinese: 式即为均匀光斑的误差信号处理模型。

sentences.english: Batwing light shape distribution, rectangular spot conforms to street light standards.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠翼配光光形，矩形光斑符合道路的标准。

sentences.english: A method of analysis of transverse modes in a plane perpendicular to a laser beam is reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道激光器输出光斑的横模组分的分析方法。

sentences.english: The flecks did float and dance.
The measurement system is based on facular-orientation theory of position sensitive detector (PSD).
sentences.chinese: 测量系统基于PSD传感器的光斑定位原理。

sentences.english: Stained-glass window panels rendered startling sun-dappled interior effects.
sentences.chinese: 彩绘玻璃窗条造成令人惊讶的室内光斑效果。

sentences.english: The formulas for determing the waist position and waist spot size of focused beam are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 导出聚焦光束束腰位置及光斑尺寸的计算公式。

sentences.english: A method is described of measuring the two-dimensional intensity of Micro-Laser-Spots in optical disc system by means of Radon Analysis.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用雷顿分析法综合光斑二维强度分布的方法。

sentences.english: The focal spot, size depend on the pinhole diaphragm diameter of spatial filter.
sentences.chinese: 光斑尺寸和空间滤波系统的针孔光阑直径有关。

sentences.english: It is well known that a light spot of sub-wavelength will diverge in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，一个次波长光斑将向各个方向发散。

sentences.english: Zero-order diffraction light spot can influence the detection of the correlation peak in joint transform correlator.
sentences.chinese: 联合变换相关器的零级衍射光斑会影响相关峰探测。

definition: to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
